time_markers.text: Upon my election as Chairperson of the AU Commission in 2012
quotes: Upon my election as Chairperson of the AU Commission in 2012, I consulted with a number of former leaders of the OAU and AU, and also requested to come and see Salim in Tanzania.
Chairperson of the African Union Commission  Addis Ababa, May 2015
Following in Nyerere’s footsteps, Salim advanced the moral, political and socio-economic justifications for African independence in the 1960s and 1970s.

And even before Tanzania’s independence in 1961, founding president Nyerere’s political party, the Tanganyika African National Union, had acknowledged the importance of an international alliance and solidarity in the fight against colonialism and oppression.
In September 1958, the party rose to the forefront of the Pan-African Freedom Movement of East and Central Africa,
